Created an attachment (id=72285)
Proposed patch to fix the bug.

Patch improves "Constraint" figure, defines constraints for pre and post conditions to avoid misleading viewmap in case constraint created not by palette tool, removes "Constraint" and "Constraint Link" tools due to incorrect implementation and obscure functionality.

Created an attachment (id=77122)
Updated version of the patch.
Existing tools to create pre- and postconditions are incorrect, so I'm removing these ones and submit separate bug 207162 concerning pre- and postcondition creation.
I have submitted updated patch by myself. Fixed.
